data.text: @CHVRCHES @laurenevemay @fatsams @yasi @Iain_A_Cook @doksan @thejonnyscott @Assai_UK Hope you all feel better soon.   :-)
@CHVRCHES @fatsams @yasi @laurenevemay @Iain_A_Cook @doksan @thejonnyscott @Assai_UK get better soon and see you on the rescheduled date, hopefully very soon 🙏
@CHVRCHES @laurenevemay @fatsams @yasi @Iain_A_Cook @doksan @thejonnyscott @Assai_UK Joke If Lauren goes to Church Soundays she play in there?😇

@CHVRCHES @fatsams @yasi @laurenevemay @Iain_A_Cook @doksan @thejonnyscott @Assai_UK I’m glad you’re doing what is necessary to keep everyone safe. I hope everyone who has it has a mild case and recovers quickly.
@CHVRCHES @fatsams @yasi @laurenevemay @Iain_A_Cook @doksan @thejonnyscott @Assai_UK Hope you're all well very soon.

@CHVRCHES @fatsams @yasi @laurenevemay @Iain_A_Cook @doksan @thejonnyscott @Assai_UK Oh God, the NME awards weren't long ago. IS ROBERT SMITH OK?? Please tell me he's safe!

(obviously, best health to everyone, but I mean... Robert Smith is Robert Smith and I make no apologies)
@CHVRCHES @fatsams @yasi @laurenevemay @Iain_A_Cook @doksan @thejonnyscott @Assai_UK What about a rescheduled Utah date? Anything in the works for that yet?
